actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require the Secretary to reauthorize participating retail food stores and wholesale food concerns biennially; to require such stores and such concerns to provide documentation to the Secretary for approval and reauthorization; to provide for the forfeiture of proceeds and property resulting from certain violations of such Act; and for other purposes.
short_title: Food Stamp Trafficking Prevention and Penalty Act of 1995

summary.text: Food Stamp Trafficking Prevention and Penalty Act of 1995 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to provide for: (1) food stamp program biennial reauthorization of retail food stores and wholesale food concerns; and (2) civil and criminal forfeiture of property for certain food stamp trafficking and use violations.

titles.title: Food Stamp Trafficking Prevention and Penalty Act of 1995

To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require the Secretary to reauthorize participating retail food stores and wholesale food concerns biennially; to require such stores and such concerns to provide documentation to the Secretary for approval and reauthorization; to provide for the forfeiture of proceeds and property resulting from certain violations of such Act; and for other purposes.
